AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: smuggled persons, possibly hidden in a pickup truck camper with fogged windows, including males and females from Mexico without immigration documents, unwashed and unkempt, attempting to avoid detection
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia's Vehicle: means of transportation for smuggled persons, a pickup truck camper involved in a stop and search near the United States-Mexico Border, specifically on Interstate Highway 35, with heavily loaded appearance and fogged windows, driven at an unusually slow speed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.illegal alien smugglers: individuals apprehended by United States Border Patrol agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia: defendant in a court case related to smuggling, arguing against the use of the Allen Charge
